data.caption: Standalone Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
In continuation of our today's letter, we wish to inform you that the Audited Standalone Financial Results were inadvertently missed out to submit as enclosure.

Kindly find enclosed herewith the Audited Standalone Financial Results along with Auditors' Reports on same.
